title: Images from Palestine are being shared as those of Delhi women in the wake of the recent riots
subtitle: Images shared as women protestors pelting stones during the Delhi riots are not from India; they are old photos from Palestine.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
Ever since riots have erupted in Delhi, the internet is flooded with many images and videos linking them to these riots. On Facebook, a collage showing masked women pelting stones is being shared in the wake of the Delhi riots. Let’s check whether those images are related to Delhi.



The image was found to exist on the internet at least since October 2015. Many of the search results suggested that the image belonged to the Israel- Palestine clashes. Those results can be seen here and here. The exact information about the image wasn’t found from credible sources. But, as it was found to exist on social media prior to the riots in Delhi, the claim is false. 



The image was found in the photo library of ‘Reuters’ and it had the following description about the image- ‘A Palestinian protester uses a slingshot as she takes cover behind a garbage bin during clashes between Palestinian stone-throwers and Israeli troops outside Ofer prison near the West Bank city of Ramallah June 5, 2012. The clashes broke out following a protest marking the anniversary of the 1967 Middle East War’. So, this image is related to the Israel- Palestine clashes.

The image was found on the website ‘Thetower.org’ and it had the following description about the image- ‘Palestinians youths hurl stones at pilgrims at nearby Rachel’s tomb’. Rachel’s tomb is considered holy to Jews, Christians, and Muslims. It is situated in Bethlehem (Palestine).

The image was found in the photo library of ‘Getty Images’ and it had the following description about the image- ‘A Palestinian young woman from the Birzeit University holds stones during clashes with Israeli security forces in Beit El, on the outskirts of the West Bank city of Ramallah, on October 7, 2015. New violence rocked Israel and the Israeli-occupied West Bank, including a stabbing in annexed east Jerusalem, even as Israel and Palestinian president Mahmud Abbas took steps to ease tensions’. So, this image is also related to the Israel- Palestine clashes.

To conclude, images from Palestine are being shared in the wake of the Delhi riots.

Did you watch our new video in the DECODE series?
